mapper.select: SELECT EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.DEPOSIT_AMT AS depositAmt /* 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_DEPOSIT_PK(P),FK_EZC_PARTNER_EZC_DEPOSIT(R),SYS_C0011359(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.DEPOSIT_AMT = #{depositAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.DEPOSIT_AMT AS depositAmt /* 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.DEPOSIT_AMT = #{depositAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_DEPOSIT SET /* 예치금 */ DEPOSIT_AMT = #{depositAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ WHERE 1=1 AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
